newsitem.title: USA: Dura Automotive says to buy Sparton unit.
newsitem.headline: Dura Automotive says to buy Sparton unit.

text.p: Dura Automotive Systems Inc will acquire the KPI Automotive Group of Sparton Corp for undisclosed terms, the companies said in announcing a definitive agreement on Thursday.
The agreement is subject to regulatory approval and other customary matters, they said. Closing is expected to occur by the end of the fourth quarter.

Dura makes automotive control mechanisms and cable-related systems. Sparton's remaining businesses include electronic and electromechanical products for the defense and industrial markets, and automotive horns.

Separately, Dura said it completed acquisition of certain assets and liabilities of the parking brake business of the Rockwell Light Vehicle Systems France SA unit of Rockwell International Corp for about $3.75 million in cash.
